segments.text: Cindy , can you show me how to call Connecticut ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A good friend of mine is there on a homestay program , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it expensive to make out-of-state calls ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but it isn't more expensive than international calls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Easy . Dial the area code for Connecticut ; then dial your friend's number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Check the local time before you call . You don't want to wake your friend up by accident .
segments.speaker: S2
